name: Screen Entry SFX
author: Kivitoe
info: A small script I made for my personal quests as a more convenient alternative to screwing around in Screen Data. It plays a sound effect whenever the player enters the screen.
description: A small script I made for my personal quests as a more convenient alternative to screwing around in Screen Data. It plays a sound effect whenever the player enters the screen. This script is great for cutscenes.
setup:
This is pretty much a plug and play script. Place an FFC with the script attached to it on your desired screen.

== Arguments ==

D0 - The SFX ID that you would like to play.
